dcterms:creator: R. Toro Icarte
T. Q. Klassen
R. Valenzano
S. A. McIlraith
dcterms:description: The cookie domain has three rooms connected by a hallway. The agent can move in the four cardinal directions and receives a reward of +1 for reaching and eating a cookie that randomly appears in one of the rooms after pressing a button.
dcterms:title: Cookie Domain

dcterms:creator: R. Toro Icarte
T. Q. Klassen
R. Valenzano
S. A. McIlraith
dcterms:description: The symbol domain consists of three rooms where symbols and arrows are placed randomly. The agent must reach the correct symbol to receive a reward.
dcterms:title: Symbol Domain

dcterms:creator: R. Toro Icarte
T. Q. Klassen
R. Valenzano
S. A. McIlraith
dcterms:description: The 2-keys domain requires the agent to open two doors with different keys to reach a reward in the orange room. The keys are randomly located in the other rooms.
dcterms:title: 2-Keys Domain
